request.description:
OAuth scope: `supplier_invoices.read`



Retrieves the supplier invoice identified by the `id` path parameter.

response.name: Returns the supplier invoice identified by the `id` path parameter.

query.description: Invoices can be filtered by their `status`.
statuses to filter on. if provided multiple times, they will be parsed as an array
statuses to filter on. if provided multiple times, they will be parsed as an array
Due date filters for invoices. If provided multiple times, they will be parsed as an array
attachment ID filters for invoices. If provided multiple times, they will be parsed as an array
attachment ID array filters for invoices.
Filter payment dates by "friendly" values.
Filter issue dates by "friendly" values.
Filter supplier invoices with missing data
Filter invoices with matched transactions
Filter invoices by document type. If provided multiple times, they will be parsed as an array
Document type array filters for invoices.
Approval workflow approver ID array filters for invoices.
Filter invoices by issue date from
Exclude credit notes from the result
Filter invoices by payable amount with operators lte/gte and currency with format payable_amount[lte]=lte:100.00:EUR
Full-text search query. To be associated with the `query_fields` param.
Fields to search in. To be associated with the `query` param.

request.description:
OAuth scope: `supplier_invoice.read`

Retrieves the list of supplier invoices for the authenticated organization.

You can filter (ex: only retrieve the latest supplier invoices) and sort this list by using [query parameters](#Query-Parameters) üëá

<Info>
  **Price plans**: this endpoint is available for all Qonto price plans except Solo basic.
</Info>

response.name: returns an array of supplier invoices

header.description: Required only for Sandbox API requests; to get one, please sign up to the [Developer Portal](https://developers.qonto.com/).
(Optional) Use only if you authenticate yourself with your API key

formdata.description: (Required)
(This can only be one of pay_by_invoice,supplier_invoices,integration,transaction_attachment,generic_upload)
Field used to append metadata to supplier invoices.
If true, skips the attachment matcher step for all invoices in the bulk request.

request.description:
OAuth scope: `supplier_invoice.write`



Creates supplier invoices **in bulk** for the authenticated organization by uploading files.

<Info>
  **Price plans**: this endpoint is available for all Qonto price plans.
</Info>

response.name:
Returns the supplier invoices created. This endpoint will always return a 200 regardless if there are any errors. Clients must ensure to check the `errors` property in order to confirm if all operations were successful.
A 400 will be r
